name: Escape the Dungeon (AlexScarf)
description:
You are a slime in a dank dungeon, but you have no wish to be here any longer! Escape the dungeon and become free to spread terror across the world at large!

Made for the HDS game jam in a weekend.

CONTROLS
A+D/LeftArrow+RightArrow - movement
W/Space/UpArrow - jumping
Mouse - choosing buttons
